Why PiAgent?

Cloud AI services own your data. We don't. PiAgent puts you back in control.

Complete Privacy

Your data never leaves the device. No cloud processing, no data mining, no surveillance.

Works Offline

Internet connection optional. Your agent runs entirely on-device, anywhere, anytime.

No Subscriptions

Buy once, own forever. No monthly fees, no API costs, no usage limits.

OpenClaw Powered

Built on the extensible OpenClaw agent architecture. Add skills, customize behavior.

Physically Secure

You own the hardware. Air-gap capable. Full disk encryption standard.

Zero Latency

No network round-trips. Instant responses. Local inference at 8+ tokens/sec.

Ready-to-Use Skills

Pre-configured agents for common tasks. Or build your own with our skill SDK.

Personal Assistant

Calendar, reminders, notes, tasks

Document Analyst

Summarize, extract, compare documents

Email Manager

Draft, organize, auto-respond

Research Assistant

Search, summarize, cite sources

Code Helper

Review, explain, debug code

Home Automator

IoT control, scripts, routines

+ More skills available in the skill store. Custom skill development available for Enterprise.
